about_the_game:
Eden Universe Is a simulation-strategy game from "god game" genre asking one simple question.

Did You ever wonder how it is like to be a God



Player become a God which goal is to develop his cult.
The world of Eden is inhabited by a variety of civilizations which are waiting for your revelation.
Be wary because you're not the only one which will try to conquer the hearts of new devotes. As a higher being, you can be Good as well as Evil. In Your decision, you will be aided by your conscience.



The player holds a wide array of possibilities in his hands. In addition to standard solutions known from strategy games like gathering resources by villagers. Eden also offer additional interactions with environment with help of your divine hand.
You're the one deciding if you want to take care of your subjects and help mortals with their trivial tasks, because you can directly deliver resources to your storage, picking up trees, stones and way more. Experiment with possibilities and learn how to get most out of your divine interference mechanic to tip the scale of victory to your side.







In addition to Divine powers, the player will have access to a divine creature called "Avatar", which mission is to help his master in his divine quest. You and your avatar are like "Yin & Yang", unseparable. All Divine pets have their own specific array of skills and dominant traits. They can mimic actions of player and enemies alike, and also other Avatars. There is also a possibility to teach him how to use Divine powers same as player.



The game beside its simplicity offers interesting and deep story which is crucial part of the gameplay. There will be time for serious decisions, but also moments for all the reference and jokes. All mission of the campaign are divided in Main, Side and Tutorial quests. Fans of puzzles will also find something for themselves because Eden is not typical strategy game and inhabitants of this world offer plethora of challenges for which awaits you great rewards.



In our Decisions we will be aided by our advisors - Good and Evil conscience.
Both characters will be charming in their own way. They will guide player in to the ways of Good and Evil God

name: Eden Universe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 2GB or better

short_description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a god? This game will definitely answer that question. In Eden Universe, you play the role of a god tasked with leading his people to victory and glory. Start your own religion and use divine powers to rule the universe of Eden.
